alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Frio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 12:48AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Frio and west central Atascosa Counties through 145 AM CST... At 1247 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Divot, or 7 miles northwest of Dilley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pearsall, Dilley, Charlotte, North Pearsall, Goldfinch, Derby, Hilltop, Bigfoot, Divot, Bluff, Schattel, Iuka, Kyote, Davis, Dobrowolski, and Three Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
